definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="mp_cost">mp_cost</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="238" y="395"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:mp_cost</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:PlayerMP</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:mp_cost</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:mp_cost</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">MPUse</field></block></statement><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">weather rain</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
